content: break yarn and put them on hold - 8 - b o dy body & pocket linings 1 vertical edge for the lining pick up 22 25 28 sts without knitting them / joining yarn of each pocket s first row with a dpn similar to the method shown in the video for picking up sts horizontally from the centre of the fabric3 start on the ws after the first body st on hold and work outwards leaving 3 sts at the zipper edge be careful to pick up all sts from the same row use a contrasting thread to mark where the vertical edge of the lining 1 will be attached to the pocket see photo using a sewing needle insert the thread in a vertical line through all sts in the same column as the last st you just picked up repeat for the other pocket round 1 rs join yarn at the last picked up st of the left pocket then k left pocket sts + body sts on hold + picked up sts of the right pocket there should be 210 230 254 sts on your needles round 2 ws p round 3 rs pick up the first 2 sts marked with contrasting yarn left pocket and slip them to the right needle k1 first regular st then pull the slipped sts over the knit st k till end of row pick up the first 2 sts marked with contrasting yarn right pocket and slip them with the last regular st to the left needle then pull the picked up sts over the last knit st repeat round 2 and 3 round 60 ws work the row as described above round 2 then slip the first 3 of the left pocket sts put on hold back onto your left working needle the 3 pocket sts closest to the zipper edge purl them don t break the yarn - 9 - b o dy body & pockets for a seamless transition between the pockets and body these sections are now knitted together one after the other while the lining sts are put on hold for now round 61 rs start by knitting the first 3 sts on your left working needle put the next 38 41 44 sts lining sts of the left pocket on hold then slip the remaining left pocket sts you put on hold on p 8 back onto your left needle knit them then continue knitting the next 134 148 166 sts body sts on your left needle put the last 38 41 44 sts lining sts of the right pocket on hold slip the right pocket sts on hold back onto your left needle and knit them there should be 216 236 260 sts on your needles round 62 ws p continue working in stockinette after round 70 put all sts on your working needles on hold don t break the yarn pocket linings inner vertical edge put the lining sts back
